title: Banned for 14 days
body:
I got banned for flame, 
1st of all it is not fair because the guys that reported me flammed the whole game and got nothing.. 
I am not that kind of a player but they always tilt you until you say something and then report you, 
if you ban me ban them too so it is fair for all or not ban anyone.
2nd Im trying to play the game and have fun not trying to argue with anyone that would be crazy.. and i don't think i deserve to be banned if you look chat they are worse than me and they got nothing.. anyway i would be really happy if you can give me another opportunity and cancel the ban or at least ban them too so it is fair for everyone! thank you!

replies.body:
Essentially, the ban that was placed was put purely because of your actions. Regardless of what was said by the other people, you are the owner of your actions at the end of the day. If you felt like something they did was punishable, I hope you remembered to report them as well.

You're more than welcome to inquire about what it was that got you punished, but Help & Support is not the place to do so. You're free to reach out to our player behavior agents in a ticket.

you most likely said "%%%" once

yeah it justifies an immediate 14 day ban

sorry it hit me too, get caught 1 more time and its a permaban
